definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: descend (Targum Syr.; v. BH (poet., and late));—

definitions.title: Haph.
definitions.body: deposit, [[ב]] loc.: Impf. 2 ms. [[תַּחֵת]] (K:§ 42, b)) Ezr 6:5 (Gu:Hpt reads 3 mpl.); Imv. ms. [[אֲחֵת]] (K:§ 15 d)) Ezr 5:15 (acc. rei); Pt. pass. pl. [[מְהַחֲתִין]] Ezr 6:1 (were) deposited.
